http

Functions for making HTTP requests.

Functions
get
FUNCTION get(
url
: 
String,
requestHeaders
: 
Dictionary<String>
): HttpResult

Perform an HTTP GET operation with the specified url.

Parameters
url
String

the url

headers

the response headers from the server

post
FUNCTION post(
url
: 
String,
post_data
: 
String,
requestHeaders
: 
Dictionary<String>
): HttpResult

Perform an HTTP POST operation with the specified url and post data.

Parameters
url
String

the url

post_data
String

the body of the POST request

headers

the response headers from the server

setRequireValidCertificate
FUNCTION setRequireValidCertificate(
requireValid
: 
Boolean
)

Set whether certificate validation is required for HTTPS requests.  Note: Turning off certificate validation is a security concern.

Parameters
requireValid
Boolean

TRUE if certificate validation is required
